astaire

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DanceManager

    public interface Controller
    A controller for the dance show programme generator system. This controller includes the 4 features that the intended prototype system is expected to have.
    Version:
    08/11/2018
    Author:
    Sylvia Wong

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Checks feasibility of a given running order.
      java.lang.String generateRunningOrder(int gaps)
      Generates a running order of the dances for the dance show.
      java.lang.String listAllDancersIn(java.lang.String dance)
      Lists the names of all performers in a specified dance.
      java.lang.String listAllDancesAndPerformers()
      Lists all dance numbers and the name of the respective performers in alphabetical order.

    • Method Detail

      • listAllDancersIn

        java.lang.String listAllDancersIn(java.lang.String dance)
        Lists the names of all performers in a specified dance.
        Parameters:
        dance - a specified dance in the dance show
        Returns:
        the name of all performers that are in the specified dance.

      • listAllDancesAndPerformers

        java.lang.String listAllDancesAndPerformers()
        Lists all dance numbers and the name of the respective performers in alphabetical order.
        Returns:
        a String representation of dance numbers and the name of the respective performers in alphabetical order

      • checkFeasibilityOfRunningOrder

        java.lang.String checkFeasibilityOfRunningOrder(java.lang.String filename,
                                                int gaps)
        Checks feasibility of a given running order.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of a tab-separated CSV file containing a proposed running order
        gaps - the required number of gaps between dances for each dancer
        Returns:
        a String representation of potential issues

      • generateRunningOrder

        java.lang.String generateRunningOrder(int gaps)
        Generates a running order of the dances for the dance show.
        Parameters:
        gaps - the required number of gaps between dances for each dancer
        -
        Returns:
        a String representation of the generate running order
